metadata.creator: Dave Trautman
metadata.description: La Asociacion Ecuatoriana en Edmonton (The Ecuadorian Association of Edmonton) presents various aspects of Ecuadorian folklore, such as traditional clothing and dances. The host interviews Dona Blanco, a representative of the Centro Ecuatoriano, about the purpose of and the activities organized by the Centre, the geography of Ecuador, the demographics, and traditional art forms (of which examples are shown). Hugo Ruiz is then interviewed about Rio Masona, an Ecuadorian soccer club.
metadata.title: Programa Nosotros. La Asociacion Ecuatoriana en Edmonton
metadata.subject: Ecuador; folklore; soccer; Ecuadorian culture; dance; fÃºtbol; cultura ecuatoriana
